text: @realDonaldTrump This #coronavirus is just the flu on steroids. We will make all eventually sick. It's inedible, so stop sucking your thumbs and put your big boy, and big girl pants on, and stop eating bats, and maybe we will be ok. @realDonaldTrump

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
